author: Special Correspondent
text:
A student explains his invention to visitors during a recent science fair in Auroville.— Photo: Special Arrangement

More than 500 students from schools in Auroville and the bio-region attended a science fair co-hosted recently by the Auroville Schools Science and Educational Training (ASSET) and the New Era Senior Secondary School, Aspiration, Auroville.

The school that presented exhibits at the science fair included the Panchayat Union Middle School, Bommiyarpalayam, Periyamudaliar Chavady and Edayanchavady, Pavendar English High School, Alankuppam, Sri Raghavendra Middle School, Chinnamudaliar Chavady, Auroville Institute of Applied Technology, Aikiyam Bilingual School and Future School in Auroville.

Helena Begum, a Norwegian well wisher of Auroville, launched the fair. Edwin Zappe, educationist from Austria, distributed certificates.
title: 500 students exhibit ideas in science fair
